article.para: The following open-source software is required to build an InterMine database:

listitem.para: The Java SDK is required to build and use InterMine

PostgreSQL is used as the relational backing store. Ensure that the postmaster is set up to accept TCP/IP connections ("tcpip_socket=true" in postgresql.conf) from "localhost" (host 127.0.0.1 in pg_ident.conf)
The Ant tool is used the invoke the InterMine build
